channel.title: VPS question?
channel.description:
Does anyone know where i can get the cheapest windows vps with the best specs?
i have around $26 CAD.

item.title: VPS question?
item.dc:creator: @ouassim ouassim
item.description:
@ouassim wrote:

What about https://www.serverffs.com/vps/

U can make ur own packages there but its linux tough u can choose wich software.

Does anyone know a good cheap windows vps ?

Read full topic

item.title: VPS question?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:10, topic:350152"][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=446519.msg3279010#msg3279010 date=1279750952]

You don’t want a windows VPS, they are more expensive, leave less ram available for the servers you run, and are much less stable and can handle fewer connections (players). Get a Linux or FreeBSD VPS.

But i have a windows computer.

So what? You can administrate any VPS from a windows computer too, or you can install linux on your computer.

You don’t want a windows VPS, they are more expensive, leave less ram available for the servers you run, and are much less stable and can handle fewer connections (players). Get a Linux or FreeBSD VPS.

I was considering linux, the vps is for personal use, no private server usage of any kind.

Which Linux OS do you recommend?

I would recommend something based on debian, either debian stable, or ubuntu LTS server are great, those are what this site is running on.
[/quote]

I’m looking for around 2GB of ram, 50gb of disk space, etc.

Can you redirect me to a website?[/quote]

I’ve never used a VPS, so I can’t tell you based on experience. This is the company I have a dedicated through though:
http://www.gigenetcloud.com/cloud-servers/price.html
I’ve also heard good things about these people:
http://www.linode.com/

Read full topic

You don’t want a windows VPS, they are more expensive, leave less ram available for the servers you run, and are much less stable and can handle fewer connections (players). Get a Linux or FreeBSD VPS.

But i have a windows computer.
[/quote]

So what? You can administrate any VPS from a windows computer too, or you can install linux on your computer.

You don’t want a windows VPS, they are more expensive, leave less ram available for the servers you run, and are much less stable and can handle fewer connections (players). Get a Linux or FreeBSD VPS.

I was considering linux, the vps is for personal use, no private server usage of any kind.

Which Linux OS do you recommend?

I would recommend something based on debian, either debian stable, or ubuntu LTS server are great, those are what this site is running on.[/quote]

I’m looking for around 2GB of ram, 50gb of disk space, etc.

Can you redirect me to a website?

item.title: VPS question?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Opium10, post:7, topic:350152”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=446519.msg3277420#msg3277420 date=1279635635]
You don’t want a windows VPS, they are more expensive, leave less ram available for the servers you run, and are much less stable and can handle fewer connections (players). Get a Linux or FreeBSD VPS.
[/quote]
But i have a windows computer.[/quote]

So what? You can administrate any VPS from a windows computer too, or you can install linux on your computer.

[quote="`Aaron, post:8, topic:350152"][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=446519.msg3277420#msg3277420 date=1279635635]
You don’t want a windows VPS, they are more expensive, leave less ram available for the servers you run, and are much less stable and can handle fewer connections (players). Get a Linux or FreeBSD VPS.
[/quote]

I was considering linux, the vps is for personal use, no private server usage of any kind.

Which Linux OS do you recommend?[/quote]

I would recommend something based on debian, either debian stable, or ubuntu LTS server are great, those are what this site is running on.
